entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: W 26 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
